00038 #ifndef _musepack_internal_h

00041 enum {
00042     MPC_DECODER_SYNTH_DELAY = 481
00043 };
00044 
00046 static inline
00047 mpc_uint32_t swap32(mpc_uint32_t val) {
00048     const unsigned char* src = (const unsigned char*)&val;
00049     return 
00050         (mpc_uint32_t)src[0] | 
00051         ((mpc_uint32_t)src[1] << 8) | ((mpc_uint32_t)src[2] << 16) | ((mpc_uint32_t)src[3] << 24);
00052 }
